trans-unit.source: Network disconnected, and you may not be able to buy the app successfully,
trans-unit.target: 您的网络已断开，可能不能正常购买应用，

trans-unit.source: Do you want to leave this page?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要离开此页面吗？

trans-unit.source: 1. Users can request a refund within two hours after payment. 2. Your first three refund requests are processed automatically, and the refunds are returned to the original account in real time. 3. The fourth and later refund requests must be reviewed manually (2-3 working days). Your refund will be issued if approved, and you will receive an explanation if rejected.
trans-unit.target: 1. 用户购买两小时内可以发起退款申请。 2. 商店前三次退款申请无需审核，实时退款至原账户。 3. 超过三次退款须经平台审核（2-3个工作日）。审核通过后会自动退款，审核不通过会告知您失败原因。

trans-unit.source: It's in adjustment, you can return to
trans-unit.target: 这款应用正在调整中，您可以返回到

trans-unit.target: 连接失败，请检查您的网络后尝试刷新

已超过购买两小时退款时限

trans-unit.source: Please select the apps to install
Your refund request is approved. The refunds will be returned to the original account in 1-2 working days, please wait patiently.
trans-unit.target: 您的退款申请已审核通过。应用退款将于1-2工作日退还至您的原账户，请耐心等待！

trans-unit.source: Your request is under review, which takes 2-3 working days.
trans-unit.target: 后台管理员审核中，请您耐心等待2-3个工作日。

trans-unit.source: Please wait patiently. Once approved, the refunds will be returned to the original account.
trans-unit.target: 审核通过后会将您的应用款项退回至您的原账户。

trans-unit.source: Your order is in exception status, please deal with it first and then request a refund.
trans-unit.target: 异常订单不允许申请退款，请先处理异常订单。

trans-unit.source: Your refund request is being processed, please wait patiently.
trans-unit.target: 订单正在退款审核中，无需重复申请。
